description: Scrape Hacker News front page and comments
task:
Browse Hacker News front page:
1. Use navigate action to go to https://news.ycombinator.com
2. Wait 2 seconds for page to load
3. Scroll down to load more posts
4. Wait 1 second
5. Click on the first post to read comments
6. Wait 2 seconds for comments to load
7. Scroll down to see more comments
8. Wait 1 second
9. Use done action to complete
